data.text:
@ChadGoldsmith @SAB0920 @K_G_Andersen @Craig_A_Spencer @TheAtlantic Family mbrs of husband had post-Christmas party. All < 45 & fit-incl AF pilot,firefighter,special ops. One pregnant & unvaxxed (drs orders🤬)others triple-vaxxed. Nine of 15 ended up pos, incl pregnant. 

3 days ago a 20 yr old son of one sick-a professional singer & dancer.
@SAB0920 @K_G_Andersen @Craig_A_Spencer @TheAtlantic It doesn’t compute with me either (hence my question) but I don’t think it’s a matter of who we value more…
@ChadGoldsmith @K_G_Andersen @Craig_A_Spencer @TheAtlantic Restaurants are more crowded than grocery stores. This just doesn’t compute with me. We value grocery workers but not servers?
@faceless_girl @K_G_Andersen @Craig_A_Spencer @TheAtlantic It’s not because of mixed / confusing messaging such as above but I’ll never lose hope.
@ChadGoldsmith @K_G_Andersen @Craig_A_Spencer @TheAtlantic How’s that working out for ya?

@K_G_Andersen @Craig_A_Spencer @TheAtlantic Totally agree!  Lockdowns/passports are not necessary, but personal responsibility is important,  e.g sometimes I work with a child who is immunocompromised
 (heart transplant), so I wear a mask, but otherwise I don't. If I had Covid I would isolate even though no 🇬🇧 rules.
